implementation_progress.last_completed_task: Database connection configured and initial migrations run
implementation_progress.current_task: Ready to start Phase 2: Hotel Models
implementation_progress.next_task: Create hotels app and implement Hotel, RoomType, Room models with tests

implementation_choices.reason: psycopg2-binary does not have prebuilt wheels for Python 3.13.7 on macOS ARM64. psycopg3 (3.2.3) has full support and is the recommended choice for new projects.
implementation_choices.impact: Database adapter works perfectly with Python 3.13.7

implementation_choices.decision: Use Supabase Session Pooler instead of Direct Connection
implementation_choices.reason: Direct connection is not IPv4 compatible. Session pooler (aws-1-us-east-2.pooler.supabase.com:5432) provides better connection management and IPv4 support.
implementation_choices.impact: Reliable database connections with connection pooling

handoff_from_architect.architect_notes: F-001 specification complete. All domain models, API endpoints, and test scenarios documented. Ready for implementation.
critical_reminders: Follow TDD approach - write tests first
Use select_related() and prefetch_related() to avoid N+1 queries
Implement proper multi-tenancy with RLS or filtering
Escalate to architect if spec is unclear

notes: Following 15-day implementation plan from handoff document
Target: Production-ready PMS core with >80% test coverage
Phase 1 COMPLETE - Environment setup, database connected
Used psycopg3 for better Python 3.13 compatibility
Ready to begin Phase 2: Hotel Models implementation
